mapper.select: select c.reg_date, c.recruit_no, c.name, c.code_no, c.result from tb_stat s join tb_calendar c on s.id=c.id where c.id = #{id} and apply = 'Y' order by reg_date desc
select c.reg_date, s.app_cnt, s.first_cnt, s.second_cnt, s.third_cnt, s.fourth_cnt, s.fifth_cnt, s.result from tb_stat s join tb_calendar c where s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_stat ( id, app_cnt, first_cnt, second_cnt, third_cnt, fourth_cnt, fifth_cnt, result ) values ( #{id}, (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and cast(code_no as unsigned) > 2000), (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and code_no = '2001' and result = 'Y' or id = #{id} and code_no = '2001' and cast(code_no as unsigned) < cast(final_round as unsigned)), (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and code_no = '2002' and result = 'Y' or id = #{id} and code_no = '2002' and cast(code_no as unsigned) < cast(final_round as unsigned)), (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and code_no = '2003' and result = 'Y' or id = #{id} and code_no = '2003' and cast(code_no as unsigned) < cast(final_round as unsigned)), (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and code_no = '2004' and result = 'Y' or id = #{id} and code_no = '2004' and cast(code_no as unsigned) < cast(final_round as unsigned)), (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and code_no = '2005' and result = 'Y'), (select count(*) from tb_calendar where id = #{id} and result = 'Y') )
